title: Fragment, 1923-7-35-a,b, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal thread
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White grosgrain with ground figure of lace-like serpentine. Large-scale sprays of roses and other flowers brocaded in polychrome silks, gold metal thread and flat silver.
